hero.title: Your E-commerce Logistics Simplified in Dakhla
hero.subtitle: Reliable pickup, storage and delivery services throughout Morocco. Grow your e-commerce business with our trusted logistics network.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Discover the advantages that make Vitalogs.ma the leader in e-commerce logistics in Morocco, with exceptional performance and quality customer service.
whyChooseUs.feature1Desc: 24-hour delivery times throughout Dakhla with real-time tracking and punctuality guarantee.
whyChooseUs.feature2Desc: The best prices on the market: 19DH for Marrakech, 35DH for other cities, with no hidden fees.
whyChooseUs.feature3Desc: Complete insurance for your packages, secure storage centers and team trained to international standards.
whyChooseUs.feature4Desc: Dedicated team available at all times to answer your questions and solve your problems quickly.

services.title: Our
services.subtitle: From pickup to delivery, we manage your entire logistics chain with expertise and reliability to grow your e-commerce business.
services.service1Desc: Fast and secure pickup of your products from your warehouse or home.
services.service2Desc: Professional storage of your goods in our secure centers.
services.service3Desc: Express delivery throughout Morocco with guaranteed deadlines and competitive rates.
services.service4Desc: Complete management of customer returns with fast and efficient processing.

coverage.title: Management of
coverage.subtitle: Easily manage your stock and packages in a few clicks. Add new products or create customer orders quickly.
coverage.addProductDesc: Add new products to your stock with all the necessary information: name, reference, quantity and variants.
coverage.addPackageDesc: Create a new customer order with all delivery information: recipient, address, zone and price.

howItWorks.title: How It
howItWorks.subtitle: Discover our simple 4-step process to transform your e-commerce logistics and take your business to the next level with Vitalogs.ma.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Create your account in a few minutes and configure your delivery preferences.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Prepare your packages and schedule a pickup or drop them off at our centers.
howItWorks.step3Desc: We sort, store and prepare your orders for optimal delivery.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Express delivery throughout Morocco with confirmation and collection within 24 hours.
howItWorks.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of e-merchants who trust sonicdelivery.ma for their logistics and grow your business today.

pricing.title: Comparison with traditional delivery companies
pricing.subtitle: Sonic Delivery Dakhla stands out for its fast delivery, order confirmation service and lower return rate in the city of Dakhla, making it a preferred choice for many customers in all cities of Morocco
pricing.traditional2: 3 days or more (from Agadir to Dakhla)
pricing.sonic3: We take care of it entirely
pricing.sonic4: Very low thanks to fast delivery
pricing.sonic5: Regular transfer according to agreement (e.g. weekly)
pricing.sonic6: Just send 20 pieces or more at once
pricing.sonic7: Possibility to send several different products together
pricing.sonic8: Focuses on sales and marketing, we handle the rest

faq.title: Ask Me Some
faq.question1: Q1. What safety measures do you have for transportation?
faq.answer1: LogisticLittle Explorers Academy offers high-quality logistics solutions for schools, ensuring smooth transportation of students to and from various destinations. Our reliable and efficient logistics team ensures punctuality LogisticLittle Explorers Academy offers high-quality logistics solutions
faq.question2: Q2. Are there options for students with specific mobility needs?
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer specialized transportation options for students with mobility needs, including wheelchair-accessible vehicles and trained staff to ensure safe and comfortable travel.
faq.question3: Q3. How can parents track the location of school buses?
faq.answer3: Parents can track school buses in real-time via our mobile app, which provides live GPS tracking, estimated arrival times and instant notifications.
faq.question4: Q4. How can parents track the location of school buses?
faq.answer4: Our tracking system uses advanced GPS technology integrated with our mobile app, allowing parents to monitor their child's journey from pickup to drop-off.
